DOMTextRun.characters: How to implement Poki's SDK in AS2
initialize pokiSDK here, at the first frame of the game by adding:
*you can check the script by opening the fla file of this tutorial and then open the first frame of the actionscript layer.
Implement commercial breaks as requested by Poki:
if you are going to implement the SDK in a .as file
are used to tell the sdk what the callback should be. And when you first enter the gameplay add:
*check the 2nd frame of the actionscript layer
when the game is paused, the player dies, the game is over, the level ends or the player quits the game or everytime the gameplay is stopped, we need to tell poki that it stopped. So we'll add:
*go to the 3rd frame and click the pauseMc and open the actions panel to check the script

We need to remove all outgoing links in the game, only links in the credit screen should stay. Poki and all of the players also didn't want intrusive commercialBreaks, right? So it's best to just place it everytime the gameplay starts. ;)
Lastly, you will need to enable pokiSDK in the config file of your game in awayFL. You can do this by opening
and set both of this to true:
- shows the debug logs coming from poki-sdk. if both of them are set to false, poki-sdk will be fully disabled.
You can see Poki SDK in action by adding this swf in the src folder and
{ rt_title: "PokiSDK AS2 sample", rt_filename: "PokiSDK AS2 sample", },
Then open the developer console of your browser and run the swf in awayFL. That's it! Have a great day! :)
